formula: a(n)=2*sum(m=1..n-1, binomial(2*n,2*m)*sum(j=0..n-m, binomial(m+j-1,j)*4^(n-m-j)*sum(i=0..j, (i-j)^(2*n-2*m)*binomial(2*j,i)*(-1)^(n+j-i))))+(-1)^n; [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 28 2011]
prog: (Maxima)a(n):=2*sum(binomial(2*n, 2*m)*sum(binomial(m+j-1, j)*4^(n-m-j)*sum((i-j)^(2*n-2*m)*binomial(2*j, i)*(-1)^(n+j-i), i, 0, j), j, 0, n-m), m, 1, n-1)+(-1)^n; [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 28 2011]
author: _R. H. Hardin_
